Support Center

We're Here to Help!

Frequently Asked Questions

How do I earn tokens?

Tokens are earned by playing games and achieving good performance. The better you play, the more tokens you earn! Each game has its own performance formula.

What is the Neural Core?

The Neural Core is your progression system. Feed it tokens to unlock new levels and features. Each completed game adds a bullet to your arsenal!

How do Virtual Machines work?

Virtual Machines replay your recorded game sessions automatically. Record a successful game run, then let the VM repeat it for passive token generation!

What does CheatEngine do?

CheatEngine allows you to modify game parameters to optimize token generation. Adjust difficulty, lives, and other settings to maximize your efficiency!

Can I reply to emails?

Email replies are currently unavailable due to system limitations. All important information will be sent to you automatically as you progress!

Contact Information
